title: Paranormal Alley
description: Welcome to Paranormal Alley. Take a stroll down Paranormal and open any door to a world of the abnormal, the weird and the downright scary. Paranormal Alley is a collaboration between the father and son, writing tag-team of Grant Leishman and Chris Leishman. If paranormal and horror is your thing, then stop awhile and check out all the doors to new and exciting worlds. Be scared, be horrified, be shocked or be thrilled; maybe all at the same time. Paranormal Alley gives you the rare opportunity to compare two different generations writing in the same genre, in a single book. Grab your copy of Paranormal Alley and be transported to the word of the macabre.
author: Chris Leishman
